i was impressed how good this looked on the deck considering its age i assumed it would be somewhat of a blurry mess but the image was sharp with no performance issues  the game itself started well but became tedious in the final hours due to consecutive obtuse puzzles which really slowed the narrative down to the extent that the story more gives up on itself rather than finishing  moderately recommend
fluid and interesting story line great for puzzle peeps and also gamers who dislike having to run and hide during gameplay
yes

its an old type point and click game very atmospheric although you cannot die it still gives you a little chill in your back thanks to great cutscenes overall very easy there are no difficult puzzles that would trip you up definitely can recommend as story itself is great
great game loved it had a great story line and flowed real well i cant wait to play the last game in this trilogy
the plot was good and the background art was great i love the old style background designs like ff7 and this

great atmosphere very absorbing but an incredibly frustrating and counterintuitive menu and inventory system that was already driving me nuts after only a short period i played this coming off the back of the curse of monkey island and so that games great mechanics really highlighted how faffy this ones is the conversation system is lame too with no real dialogue choices not for me
fun well written point and click puzzles are very good to any fan of this style of game it is a must play

still life is a mysteryactionpuzzle game meant for horror and mystery fans its a point and click title where you find clues and try to solve the murder case the graphics are very detailed with a combination of 2d3d elements combined with particle systems to mimic a 3d enviorment it has a slow start learning the basics but the story will pull you in and keep you interested all the way through pick this up with its sequel on sale  5555
its a good game i had to use walkthrough in some part but the story is good
very good story very very terrible gameplay just like all the old pc games of microids

i didnt really like the opening chapter but for the rest of the game the story is very well done and worth playing just be warned that some of the puzzles are very annoying to get past because they must be done in a very specific order
amazing
